ValidationRule.description: Related advice must be of correct status to mark task as complete
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
!$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && AND(
RecordType.DeveloperName = "Chase_new_scope_of_advice",
ISPICKVAL( Status, "Completed"),
ISPICKVAL( Related_Advice__r.Scope_of_advice_status__c , "Sent to client"),
NOT( ISPICKVAL( Related_Advice__r.Scope_of_advice_status__c , "Accepted") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Scope not sent to client on related advice
